creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: two lines; five large characters; grouping of smaller, loopy writing at LLC with two stamps; square, borderless stamp URC
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Marks, and Seal

on white sheet adhered to back of silk, Japanese inscription
markings: URC, borderless relief and intaglio; LLC, square intaglio; LLC square relief; on back, bottom center of attached white paper: H Gogaku]
title: Calligraphy
